content.text: Hi, I'm User 1. I'm a big fan of sports. What are your hobbies?
Hi, I'm User 2. I also love sports! I'm a big fan of the New York Yankees and the New York Giants.
Nice! I'm a big fan of the New York Mets and the New York Jets.
We should go to a game together sometime!
That would be great! I love watching live sports.
Me too! What do you do for work?
Oh, that's cool! I'm a sales manager.
I've always been interested in sales.
It's a lot of fun! I love meeting new people and helping them find what they need.
That sounds like a great job.
It is! What's your favorite thing to do for fun?
I love to watch YouTube videos and play video games.
I love watching YouTube videos too! What kind of videos do you like to watch?
I like to watch funny videos, music videos, and gaming videos.
Me too! I love watching gaming videos. I'm always looking for new games to play.
Me too! I love trying new games.
I think we'd be great friends! We have so much in common.
